Curse.description: Raises Attack and Defense stats by 1 stage each, reduces Speed stat by 1 stage.

Body_Slam.description: Deals damage and 30% chance of paralysis.

Rest.description: Sleeps for 2 turns, but fully restores HP and clears status effects.

Meteor_Mash.description: Deals damage and 20% chance to raise Attack stat by 1 stage.

Close_Combat.description: Lowers Defense and Sp_Def stats by 1 stage each.

Bullet_Punch.description: Deals damage, usually moves before most other moves.

Dragon_Dance.description: Raises Attack and Speed stats by 1 stage each.

Double_Edge.description: Deals damage and receives recoil damage of 1/3 of target's lost HP from damage.

Scald.description: Deals damage and 30% chance to burn the target.

Toxic.description: Badly poisons the target, and if the user is a Poison type Pokemon, this move will always hit the target.

Sludge_Bomb.description: Deals damage and 30% chance to poison the target.

Stone_Edge.description: Deals damage, has a high critical hit ratio.

Ice_Punch.description: Deals damage and 10% chance to Freeze the target.

Rock_Slide.description: Deals damage and 30% chance to flinch the target.

Crunch.description: Deals damage and 20% chance to lower target's Defense stat by 1 stage.

Fire_Punch.description: Deals damage and 10% chance to Burn the target.

Quiver_Dance.description: Raises the user's Sp_Atk, Sp_Def and Speed stats by 1 stage each.

Flamethrower.description: Deals damage and 10% chance to Burn the target.

Bug_Buzz.description: Deals damage and 10% chance to lower the target's Sp_Def stat by 1 stage.

Roost.description: User restores 50% of their max HP, rounded half up.

Shadow_Ball.description: Deals damage and 20% chance of lowering target's Sp. Def stat by 1 stage.

Sludge_Wave.description: Deals damage and 10% chance of Poisoning the target.

Focus_Blast.description: Deals damage and 10% chance of lowering target's Sp. Def stat by 1 stage.

Thunderbolt.description: Deals damage and 10% chance to Paralyse the target.

Fire_Blast.description: Deals damage and 10% chance to Burn the target.

Air_Slash.description: Deals damage and 30% chance to Flinch the target.

Ice_Beam.description: Deals damage and 10% chance to Freeze the target.

Aura_Sphere.description: Deals damage and this move will always hit.

Leech_Seed.description: Target loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, and user gains that same amount of HP at the end of every turn.

Leaf_Storm.description: Deals damage and lowers the user's Sp_Atk stat by 2 stages.

Psychic.description: Deals damage and 10% chance to lower target's Sp_Def stat 1 stage.

Moonblast.description: Deals damage and 30% chance to lower target's Sp_Atk stat by 1 stage.

Ice_Shard.description: Deals damage, usually moves before most other moves.

Icicle_Crash.description: Deals damage and 30% chance to flinch the target.

Draco_Meteor.description: Deals damage and then lowers the user's Sp_Atk stat by 2 stages.

Dark_Pulse.description: Deals damage and 20% chance to flinch the target.

Charge_Beam.description: Deals damage and 70% chance to raise user's Sp_Atk stat by 1 stage.

Thunder_Punch.description: Deals damage and 10% chance to Paralyse the target.

Mystical_Fire.description: Deals damage and lowers target's Sp_Atk stat by 1 stage.
